OrgName.entry: ASIAN BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT NETWORK (ABDN) - SOUTH YORKSHIRE & THE UK

Desc.entry: Works to assist in the development of businesses in South Yorkshire and the UK through an active network that shares best practice, creates access opportunities and represents its members at the highest levels. Helps to identify issues of particular concern to businesses, create employment opportunities in local communities, develop partnerships with public, private and voluntary sector businesses and promote sustainable regeneration.

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - GENERAL SUPPORT ORGANISATIONS
